author: nero_eth
content:
I've created a PR to define two RPC methods for BALs:
- `eth_getBlockAccessListByHash` — returns the BAL for a block by hash  
- `eth_getBlockAccessListByNumber` — returns the BAL for a block by number or tag  
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/726

cc <@543900561460822016> <@425572898787426305>
